title: TheKinOfTheFreljord (TKTF) Recruiting! (ANY DIVISION).
body:
TKTF Are a Casual (blind pick)  and Competitive Team made for all divisions 


Ign:
Age:
Role:
Main Champ:
Division:
Reasons why you want to join:
Some other stuff like weaknesses:

Will take any roll mainly bcz i assume people really want adc :D

replies.body:
Ign: RivenSmurfs
Age: 16
Role: Jungle
Main champs: I don't have any I can proficiently play every jungler
Devision: Lvl 10 :3
Reasons: It is so boring levelling up a smurf on oce on your own.
Weaknesses: I do not have a large champion pool so I am restricted to free week champions and 3150 and down champs.

> [{quoted}](name=RivenSmurfs,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=XsEg00MJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-10T23:11:34.734+0000)

> Weaknesses: I do not have a large champion pool so I am restricted to free week champions and 3150 and down champs.

Previous rank lel but nice app :D

Ign: sky227
Age:16
Role:ADC/support
Main champ: Jinx >:)
Division:unranked lvl.30
Reason: very interested in having a team to level with and bond with. So excited for a team that is interested in bonding and becoming not only teammates but friends.
Weakness: placement as an ADC. I would like to learn to stay back and let others tank, yet i never have a sufficient tank so i end up tank/damage.

Ign: Tonkymac
Age: 22
Role: ADC
Main Champ: Lucian, Corki
Division: S3
Reasons why you want to join: Looking for ranked team to further better my gaming experience and learn new things, also solo q is full of AFK's and people who cant work well as a team :(
Some other stuff like weaknesses: im pretty good all round, but would like to be better at everything the game has to offer.  Little things like trade timings, avoiding and dealing with hard lane pressure from junglers and lane swap match ups

> [{quoted}](name=tonkymac,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=XsEg00MJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-10T17:47:51.250+0000)

> Some other stuff like weaknesses: im pretty good all round, but would like to be better at everything the game has to offer.  Little things like trade timings, avoiding and dealing with hard lane pressure from junglers and lane swap match ups

All good we all here to learn, nice app
thanks, still putting the team together?

> [{quoted}](name=tonkymac,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=XsEg00MJ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-13T13:44:48.842+0000)
>
> thanks, still putting the team together?

Got the mains set up, looking for subs

Ign: Ranger
Age: 20
Role: Mid/ADC
Main Champ: Ahri/Ezreal
Division: D5
Reasons why you want to join: Just looking for some more people to play with, and playing with a ranked team to earn the rewards for the 2015 Season.
Some other stuff like weaknesses: Generally pretty good in lane, but I find I'm prone to ganks most of the time, need to work on warding and map awareness.

> [{quoted}](name=Ranger,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=XsEg00MJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-11T03:31:46.708+0000)

Okay warding  isnt only your problem its all teams :P Map awareness will be easy no doubt ;) Good app
